resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104769</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104769</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203749</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mahogany Tides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">MahagoniGezeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Marées D'acajou</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Marés De mogno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Maree Di mogano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παλίρροιες μαονιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mareas De caoba</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This Smithsonian K-12 Education website provides a brief overview of mahogany tide (also known as red tide) events. These events are caused by dinoflagellates, a special type of phytoplankton, and can harm sea life. This website also features links to other related red tide sites.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Smithsonian Ausbildung K-12 Web site liefert 
einen kurzen Überblick über MahagoniFälle der Gezeiten (alias
rote Gezeiten). Diese Fälle werden durch dinoflagellates,
ein spezieller Typ Phytoplankton verursacht und können das Seleben 
schädigen. Diese Web site kennzeichnet auch Links zu anderen in
Verbindung stehenden roten Gezeitensites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site Web Smithsonien de l'éducation K-12 
fournit une brève vue d'ensemble des événements d'acajou de marée 
(également connue sous le nom de marée rouge). Ces 
événements sont provoqués par les dinoflagellates, un type spécial
de phytoplancton, et peuvent nuire à la vie de mer. Ce site Web
comporte également des liens à d'autres sites rouges relatifs de 
marée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este Web site smithsonian da instrução K-12 
fornece uma vista geral breve dos eventos de mogno da maré (sabida 
também como a maré vermelha). Estes eventos são causados 
pelos dinoflagellates, um tipo especial de phytoplankton, e podem 
prejudicar a vida do mar. Este Web site caracteriza também as 
ligações a outros locais vermelhos relacionados da maré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo Web site smithsonian di formazione K-12 
fornisce una breve descrizione degli eventi di mogano di marea (anche 
conosciuta come la marea rossa). Questi eventi sono causati dai 
dinoflagellates, un tipo speciale di fitoplancton e possono nuoc la 
vita del mare. Questo Web site egualmente caratterizza i 
collegamenti ad altri luoghi rossi relativi di marea.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο σμιθσονιτικός ιστοχώρος εκπαίδευσης Κ- 12 
παρέχει μια συνοπτική επισκόπηση των γεγονότων παλίρροιας 
μαονιού (επίσης γνωστής ως κόκκινη παλίρροια). Αυτά τα 
γεγονότα προκαλούνται από τα dinoflagellates, ένας ειδικός 
τύπος φυτοπλαγκτόντος, και μπορούν να βλάψουν τη ζωή θάλασσας. 
Αυτός ο ιστοχώρος χαρακτηρίζει επίσης τις συνδέσεις με 
άλλες σχετικές κόκκινες περιοχές παλίρροιας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este Web site smithsonian de la educación K-12 
proporciona a una descripción abreviada de los acontecimientos de 
caoba de la marea (también conocida como marea roja). Estos 
acontecimientos son causados por los dinoflagellates, un tipo especial
de phytoplankton, y pueden dañar vida del mar. Este Web site 
también ofrece conexiones a otros sitios rojos relacionados de la 
marea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:SMITHSONIAN EDUCATION
FN:SMITHSONIAN EDUCATION
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203749</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104769</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/mahogany-tides</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
